Urgent Maintenance Required on Retail Unity servers:

 

Dear Colleague, 

We are currently experiencing performance issues with Retail Unity (RU) which requires to be addressed as a matter or priority.

 

The Retail Unity servers need to be upgrade and this will require downtime of up to 15 minutes for each Brand.  However, this is a background function and no operational impact should be noticed.  Background functions will resume once the servers are back online.

 

The servers are going to be upgraded starting at 16:00 GST and will be completed by 18:00 GST.

 

Thank you for your understanding.

 

For support during this period, please raise a ticket via OneReach. You can also check real-time status updates via the Tech&Data System Status & Health Dashboard <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> .
